desc: 戦闘開始から４ターン、攻撃力・防御力を１５０％アップ＆クリティカル率をかなりアップ＆確率で通常攻撃を全体攻撃化

dictionary.lore: There is an extremely rare white branch that grows deep in the forest. It can grow on any type of tree, and it holds a strong magical power that has a healing effect on all lifeforms that come near it. Alces is made from this white branch. Just like the white branch, it is white in appearance and retains its healing powers, boosting the recovery rate of those who wield it.

name: 絶神崇環アルケス
